projects.name: Previously On Twitch
projects.description: Previously On Twitch is an compeletly automated Youtube Channel. Project is still in development process.

projects.name: Li-Fi (Global Gamejam 2018)
projects.description: Transmit your light signal to receiver through maze-like rooms. Obstacles have 4 types that makes light behave differently.

projects.name: Quest Generator
projects.description: A random quest generator application I started developing to understand node.js, express and socket.io while improving my javascript and jQuery skills.

projects.name: Aprilis
projects.description: Aprilis is a hub for Role-playing gamers where players can create new games and comment on others. This is a project I started developing to improve my skills and knowledge about web applications.

projects.name: Drunken Sailor (Global Gamejam 2017)
projects.description: A drunken sailor drifted to a mysterious island must find a way to build a raft and return back to his beloved one. This game was created during the Global Game Jam 2017's Bahçeşehir University Game Lab (BUG) segment. Due to time concerns and a small team composing of 4 passionate gamers, we decided to focus on the story telling aspects of the game rather than the mechanics.

projects.name: Simply Football
projects.description: A simple football game developed in Unreal Engine 4.
